channel.title: Need help with makeing npc's talk
channel.description: Hi moparscape players i need help with makeing npc's talk please help me :rolleyes: :rolleyes:

item.title: Need help with makeing npc's talk
item.dc:creator: @lov3_rs_money lov3_rs_money
item.description:
@lov3_rs_money wrote:

[quote=“simon, post:2, topic:167138”]Read tutorials theres millons of them on the tutorial section of this website.

Read them before you post.[/quote]
god dont be a umm shall we say… harsh…

go into npchandler.java
and then search for

moo

then under the last }
enter this:

if (npcs[i].npcType == (Npc ID)) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = "(What U Want It To Say)";
}
}

hope it helped!

lov3_rs_money

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with makeing npc's talk
